name: Choose the source to fill
description: In this mode the player have a single vessel and multiple choices to be picked to fill the vessel. The more accurate the player fills the vessel - the more points would be gathered. If the player overpass the limits - no points would be acquired for this level

name: Tap to fill
description: In this mode the player will have a single vessel and an infinite source of water. The main objective of this game - fill the vessel until the mark to earn points. If the player overpass the limits - no points would be acquired for this level
